ygData.subject: Re: Re: faq
ygData.msgSnippet: We re making the same point.  People said that Druids and Shamans were the Jack of all trades  I was saying that they really can t back that up since they
ygData.messageBody:
We're making the same point. People said that Druids and Shamans were
the "Jack of all trades" I was saying that they really can't back that
up since they can't melee at a decent level. I was being flippant with
the pretend comment.

I think bards melee is strong enough offensivly, just comes in a little
short on the recieving damage end. Then again if we could tank better,
that would hardly be fair to the other melee types who don't get any (OR
as much) magic. We don't get a kick or bash, but could you imagine
trying to weave that into the whole triple woven song button mash?
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
